amendment.description: To provide steady updates of payment rates under the Medicare physician fee schedule.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1118 not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay. 11 - 89. Record Vote Number: 141.

action.text: Amendment SA 1118 proposed by Senator Cotton. (consideration: CR S2159; text: CR S2159) To provide steady updates of payment rates under the Medicare physician fee schedule.
